name: Shmup AAA+
description:
A game made with Unity and Entitas v0.21.0 for learning purposes.

Map is procedural (infinite) and score is calculated for each enemy defeated. Beat those ships and get into the online leaderboard, you got only 3 lives !


> Play it online (WebGL)

> Source code (GitHub)

> Post-mortem (Spanish)



Programming & GFX
